When you take the Attack action on your turn, you can replace one of your attacks with a swirl of your extended and sharpened neck feathers that lifts you 5ft in the air before immediately dropping back down. When you do this, each creature within a 5ft radius must make a Dexterity saving throw of DC = 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus. On a failed save, a creature takes 1d8 slashing damage. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage.
This damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).
You can use Wicked Wind a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
